SlimeVR-Tracker-ESP.description: The latest stable firmware release with 9 DoF ICM20948 and BNO0xx (magnetometer enabled)
Based off SlimeVR/main with 9 DoF ICM20948 and BNO0xx (magnetometer enabled)
The latest stable firmware release with "trackerPort" set to 6970 instead of 6969
Based off SlimeVR/main with "trackerPort" set to 6970 instead of 6969
